EmailTemplate.name: Booking Refund Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Refund amount for {!Booking__c.Name} has been processed.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi,
The refund for {!Booking__c.Name} of {!Booking__c.Primary_Applicant_Name_Formulla__c} for {!Booking__c.Project_Name_Formulla__c} has been processed and is ready for payment.
Please click on the link for more details: {!Booking__c.Link}
Regards, Dynamix Group
